title: Kirchhoff junction - rank I in 4 of 5 resistors

content.question: A circuit consists of five identical resistors and a battery, as shown in the figure. Four of the resistors are labeled <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math>, <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>, <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>, and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the magnitudes <math alttext="I sub W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></msub></math>, <math alttext="I sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></msub></math>, <math alttext="I sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></msub></math>, and <math alttext="I sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></msub></math> of the currents in the four labeled resistors?

choices.label: <math alttext="I sub W equals I sub X, which equals I sub Y, which equals I sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, I sub X equals I sub Z, close parenthesis, is greater than open parenthesis, I sub W equals I sub Y, which equals 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, I sub X equals I sub Z, close parenthesis, is greater than open parenthesis, I sub W equals I sub Y, close parenthesis, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub Z, is greater than open parenthesis, I sub W equals I sub X, which equals I sub Y, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="I sub Z, is greater than open parenthesis, I sub W equals I sub X, which equals I sub Y, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>W</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
